verses.verse: And <WG2532> I stood <WG2476> upon <WG1909> the sand <WG285> of the sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> a beast <WG2342> rise up <WG305> out of <WG1537> the sea <WG2281>, having <WG2192> seven <WG2033> heads <WG2776> and <WG2532> ten <WG1176> horns <WG2768>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> his <WG846> horns <WG2768> ten <WG1176> crowns <WG1238>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> his <WG846> heads <WG2776> the name <WG3686> of blasphemy <WG988>. name: or, names
